CustomBehavior.TerminateWhen: !HasItem(40686) || Object(192694) != null || Object(191567) != null || Object(192693) != null

CustomBehavior.UseWhen: Me.CurrentTarget != null && Me.CurrentTarget.Entry == 30142 && Me.CurrentTarget.IsAlive && Me.CurrentTarget.Aggro && Me.BagItems.FirstOrDefault(x => x.Entry == 42624).Cooldown == 0
